channel.title: eSIM Myanmar - ESIM MYANMAR COMPANY LIMITED
channel.description: Latest eSIM plans, mobile data offers, and connectivity solutions in Myanmar

item.title: Tourist eSIM Plan - 7 Days Myanmar Connectivity
item.description: Perfect for travelers visiting Myanmar. Get 5GB high-speed data with nationwide coverage for just $15 USD. Instant activation and no physical SIM required.

item.title: Business eSIM Plan - 30 Days Premium Connectivity
item.description: Designed for business travelers and professionals. 20GB premium network access with 24/7 support for $35 USD per month.

item.title: Extended Stay eSIM - 90 Days Best Value
item.description: Long-term connectivity solution with 50GB data allowance. Renewable plan offering the best value at $85 USD for 90 days.
